name: RUNE (itch)
description:
This is the version 2.0 of the game.

Pitch : It has been almost six hours since you have entered this cursed pyramid. Upon reaching the table, you noticed four carved patterns on the wall and a bag full of runes. You understand you have to make those patterns as fast as you can. Walls start contracting on you when you approach the table.

Controls :

C - put a rune
